item.title: about me
item.description: Thanks for stopping by! I am currently a data scientist at the Commercial Operations Division of AC Energy Philippines where I create and deploy market forecasting models and provide weather/climate insights for power trading. Prior to that, I trained for 6 years as a climate scientist, specializing in regional monsoon dynamics and climate model evaluation. I’m also the lead researcher of Project GeoNetworksPH, where we quantitatively assessed the strengths and weaknesses of the transportation network of Visayas, Philippones for relief distribution logistics.
